entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Red Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:53 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Lake Airport 10:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -27.1°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -29.8°C
Wind: SW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
